segments.advisor_message: Okay, let's go over what you've shared so far. I just wanna confirm, your first name is John, right?
segments.client_message: Yea, it's John. Just John, no middle names.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, John. And what's your last name? You mentioned it earlier, it was Smith?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, it's Smith. I also go by Johnny sometimes.

segments.advisor_message: Thanks, Johnny! Just to wrap this up, I need to double-check your birthdate. You said it was the 15th of March, 1990, right?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, 15-03-1990. Born in, um, New York.
